name: RollFood
author: DM Brad
short: Roll a random restaurant from a Google Sheet.
description: Pick a random restaurant from a Google Spreadsheet and optionally start a group order.
install_msg: Use [p]foodconfig sheet <sheet_id> to set up your restaurant list. You also need to set an API key.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data about users.
